item.title: Canon 1100D
item.description:
Php 19,600.00
Checkout with Multiply: 
http://widgetcity.multiply.com/
Yes
Specifications

 

  • Type: Digital AF/AE SLR
  • Recording Media: CF Card Type I and II, SD/SDHC Memory Card (1 slot each), UDMA Mode 6 CF cards and/or External media (USB v.2.0 hard drive, via optional Canon Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E2/E2A or Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E2 IIA)
  • Image Sensor Size: 1.098 x 0.73 in./ 27.9 x 18.6 mm (APS-H size sensor)
  • IMAGE SENSOR: 22.2 x 14.7mm CMOS
  • Effective Pixels: Approx. 12.2M
  • Aspect Ratio: 3:2
  • Sensor Cleaning: Manual cleaning and Dust Delete Data acquisition
  • Colour Filter Type: Primary Colour
  • IMAGE PROCESSOR Type: DIGIC 4
  • Lens Mount: EF/EF-S
  • Focal Length: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
  • FOCUSING Type: TTL-CT-SIR with a CMOS sensor
  • AF System/ Points: 9 AF points (f/5.6 cross type at centre
  • ISO Sensitivity: AUTO (100-6400), 100-6400 (in 1-stop increments)
  • SHUTTER Type: Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter, with electronic first curtain
  • Speed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
  • LCD MONITOR Type: 6.8cm (2.7") TFT, approx. 230k dots
  • LIVE VIEW MODE Type: Electronic viewfinder with image sensor
  • STORAGE Type: SD card, SDHC card or SDXC card
  • Batteries: 1 x Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LP-E10
  • Body Materials: Stainless Steel and polycarbonate resin with conductive fiber
  • Dimensions (WxHxD): 129.9 x 99.7 x 77.9 mm
  • Weight (Body Only): Approx. 495g (CIPA testing standard, including battery and memory card)

 

Package

 

  • 1 Canon EOS 1100D DSLR Camera
  • 1 LP-E10 Battery Pack
  • 1 LC-E10 Battery Charger
  • 1 Data Cable (USB)
  • 1 AV Cable
  • 1 CD-ROM
  • 1 User's Guide
  • Freebie 4GB/Bag/ Screen protector

 

Php 19,600.00

  • Low-Pass Filter: Built-in/Fixed
  • Sensor Cleaning: EOS integrated cleaning system
  • Colour Filter Type: Primary Colour

  • Lens Mount: EF/EF-S
  • Focal Length: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
  • FOCUSING Type: TTL secondary image forming, phase difference detection with AF dedicated CMOS sensor
  • ISO Sensitivity: AUTO(100-6400), 100-12800 in 1-stop increments ISO can be expandable to H: 25600)
  • SHUTTER Type: Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter
  • SHUTTER Speed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
  • VIEWFINDER Type: Pentamirror
  • LCD MONITOR Type: Touch screen vari angle 7.7cm (3.0") 3:2 Clear View II TFT, approx. 1040K dots
  • Coverage: Approx. 100%
  • Viewing Angle (Horizontally/Vertically): Approx 170 degree
  • Built-in Flash GN (ISO 100, meters): 13
  • Built-in Flash Coverage: up to 17mm focal length (35mm equivalent: 28mm)
  • Built-in Flash Recycle Time: Approx. 3 seconds
  • Modes: Auto, Manual flash, Integrated Speedlite Transmitter
  • LIVE VIEW MODE Type: Electronic viewfinder with image sensor
  • Coverage: Approx. 99% (horizontally and vertically)
  • STORAGE Type: SD, SDHC or SDXC (UHS-I)card
  • Batteries: 1 x Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LP-E8
  • Battery Life: Approx. 440
  • Dimensions (WxHxD): 133.1 x 99.8 x 78.8 mm

Php 26,800.00

Specifications

 

  • IMAGE SENSOR: Type: 22.3 x 14.9mm CMOS
  • Effective Pixels: Approx. 18.0 megapixels
  • Aspect Ratio: 3:2
  • Low-Pass Filter: Built-in/Fixed
  • Sensor Cleaning: EOS integrated cleaning system
  • Colour Filter Type: Primary Colour
  • IMAGE PROCESSOR Type: DIGIC 4
  • Lens Mount: EF/EF-S
  • Focal Length: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
  • FOCUSING Type: TTL-CT-SIR with a CMOS sensor
  • AF System/ Points: 9 AF points (f/5.6 cross type at centre, extra sensitivity at f/2.8)
  • AF Point Selection: Automatic selection, Manual selection
  • Selected AF Point Display: Superimposed in viewfinder and indicated on LCD monitor
  • ISO Sensitivity: AUTO (100-6400), 100-6400 Expandable to H (approx 12800) in 1-stop increments
  • SHUTTER Type: Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter
  • Speed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
  • WHITE BALANCE Type: Auto white balance with the imaging sensor
  • VIEWFINDER Type: Pentamirror
  • Coverage (Vertical/Horizontal): Approx. 95%
  • LCD MONITOR Type: Vari angle 7.7cm (3.0") 3:2 Clear View TFT, approx. 1040K dots
  • Built-in Flash GN (ISO 100, meters): 13
  • Built-in Flash Coverage: Up to 17mm focal length (35mm equivalent: 27mm)
  • LIVE VIEW MODE Type: Electronic viewfinder with image sensor
  • STORAGE Type: SD card, SDHC card or SDXC card
  • Batteries: 1 x Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LP-E8
  • Dimensions (WxHxD): 133.1 x 99.5 x 79.7 mm
  • Weight (Body Only): Approx. 570g (CIPA testing standard, including battery and memory card)

 

Package

  • 1 Strap
  • 1 CD-ROM
  • 1 User's Guide

item.description:
Php 33,800.00
Yes
Specification

 

  • Effective pixels: 18 million
  • Image sensor: APS-C CMOS sensor; The maximum resolution: 5184 x 3456?.
  • Sensitivity: ISO 100 to 6400 in steps of +/- 5EV Exposure Compensation
  • Storage media: CompactFlash (Type I,and II ),Support SD / SDHC / SDXC
  • Monitor: 3", approx. 104,000-dot, 170-degree wide-viewing-angle
  • Support 5.3 fps continuous shooting speed, a record 58 consecutive JPEG or 16 RAW photos.
  • Exposure modes: Programmed Auto (P) with flexible program, Shutter-Priority Auto (S), Aperture-Priority Auto (A), Manual (M)
  • Shutter Speed: Support for 30 seconds to 1 / 8000 sec
  • Dimensions: 145 x 106 x 79 mm
  • Weight: 675g
